name: sunith vs

top_projects.name: devb.io
top_projects.description: DevB.io seamlessly transforms your GitHub footprint into a living, breathing portfolio. Powered by AI, it tells your developer story while you focus on what matters most: writing great code. No more portfolio maintenance headaches, just pure coding brilliance on display.

top_projects.name: kph-products
top_projects.description: A platform for listing products from kph(kerala product hunt) communitiy.

top_projects.name: event-checkin
top_projects.description: An event checking platform developed for cusat to host International Conclave on Next-Gen Higher Education 2025.

top_projects.name: marine-science
top_projects.description: A Django-based web application for managing marine science conference registrations, abstract submissions, and payments. The system provides a complete solution for conference organization, including user authentication, payment processing, and content management.

top_projects.name: thanthavibe.in
top_projects.description: A thanthavibe calculator which hit 500+ users in the release date.

top_projects.name: git-session
top_projects.description: a project to learn git and github

sunithvs/devb.io.summary: On March 10, significant contributions were made to the devb.io repository. Push events and pull request events indicate that updates were pushed to the repository, including file changes to weekly_sync.yml and the addition of environment variables to the test workflow.

sunithvs/devb.io/v2.summary: On March 2 and 3, multiple pull requests were created to update the codebase and improve the UI and features of the repository. These changes include updating README.md, improving the UI for project cards, and making small UI fixes.

sunithvs/devb.io/branch-53.summary: On March 2 and 4, multiple commits were made to the repository, including updating README.md and adding environment variables to the test workflow. This was done to improve the UI and features of the repository.

Agastya18/devb.io/branch-71.summary: On March 4, a pull request was created to update the integration card UI by modifying the colors and enhancing the shadow effect for better visibility and aesthetics.

profile_summary: As a seasoned Python, TypeScript, and C developer with a strong background in backend systems, I leverage my expertise to drive innovation and efficiency in software development. With 123 public repositories to my name and a network of 118 followers, I've had the opportunity to collaborate with and influence like-minded professionals. Currently a Backend Developer at Eduport and a CUSAT alumnus, I bring a unique blend of technical acumen and industry experience to drive meaningful solutions.
